d.Name: SAP Order Management Foundation Integration with SAP S/4HANA
d.Description: SAP Order Management foundation allows you to transfer physical product master data from SAP S/4HANA so that these products can be included in orders. In addition, orders created in SAP Order Management foundation are then sent to SAP S/4HANA for fulfillment. All versions of SAP S/4HANA are supported.
d.ShortText: Transfer products for inclusion in orders and send orders for fulfillment
